text.autoconfig.clientminer.title: ⛏ Client Vein Miner ⛏
text.autoconfig.clientminer.option.rayca: Prevents mining blocks other than the vein.
text.autoconfig.clientminer.option.snapB: After finishing mining a vein return camera to the state before.
text.autoconfig.clientminer.option.rotat: Speed at which vein miner will switch to a new ore. 1 = instant.
text.autoconfig.clientminer.option.sound: Play a chime sound after finishing mining a vein.
text.autoconfig.clientminer.option.autom: OFF = Only mine when left click is held
